name: Spell It!
description:
Spell It! is an educational game for multiple systems.

Contains several spelling mini-games:
  • See It - The player sees a word, and then must spell it correctly in a sentence.
  • Practice It - The player briefly sees a word, and then must type it correctly after it disappears
  • Unscramble It - A 1 - 2 player tic-tac-toe game, where they player must unscramble a word to gain a position. Three-in-a-row wins.
  • Spell It! - The player moves a frog to eat the word that is spelled correctly.
alsoFor: Apple II, Commodore 64, DOS | Combined View
